verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <WH1732> Unto <WH413> thee, O LORD, <WH3068> do I lift up <WH5375> my soul. <WH5315>
O my God, <WH430> I trust <WH982> in thee: let me not <WH408> be ashamed, <WH954> let not <WH408> mine enemies <WH341> triumph <WH5970> over me.
Yea, <WH1571> let none <WH3605> <WH3808> that wait <WH6960> on thee be ashamed: <WH954> let them be ashamed <WH954> which transgress <WH898> without cause. <WH7387>
Show <WH3045> me thy ways, <WH1870> O LORD; <WH3068> teach <WH3925> me thy paths. <WH734>
Lead <WH1869> me in thy truth, <WH571> and teach <WH3925> me: for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art the God <WH430> of my salvation; <WH3468> on thee do I wait <WH6960> all <WH3605> the day. <WH3117>
Remember, <WH2142> O LORD, <WH3068> thy tender mercies <WH7356> and thy lovingkindnesses; <WH2617> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> have been ever of old. <WH4480> <WH5769>

Remember <WH2142> not <WH408> the sins <WH2403> of my youth, <WH5271> nor my transgressions: <WH6588> according to thy mercy <WH2617> remember <WH2142> thou <WH859> me for thy goodness' sake, <WH4616> <WH2898> O LORD. <WH3068>
Good <WH2896> and upright <WH3477> is the LORD: <WH3068> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> will he teach <WH3384> sinners <WH2400> in the way. <WH1870>
The meek <WH6035> will he guide <WH1869> in judgment: <WH4941> and the meek <WH6035> will he teach <WH3925> his way. <WH1870>
All <WH3605> the paths <WH734> of the LORD <WH3068> are mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> unto such as keep <WH5341> his covenant <WH1285> and his testimonies. <WH5713>
For thy name's sake, <WH4616> <WH8034> O LORD, <WH3068> pardon <WH5545> mine iniquity; <WH5771> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is great. <WH7227>
What <WH4310> man <WH376> is he that <WH2088> feareth <WH3373> the LORD? <WH3068> him shall he teach <WH3384> in the way <WH1870> that he shall choose. <WH977>
His soul <WH5315> shall dwell <WH3885> at ease; <WH2896> and his seed <WH2233> shall inherit <WH3423> the earth. <WH776>
The secret <WH5475> of the LORD <WH3068> is with them that fear <WH3373> him; and he will show <WH3045> them his covenant. <WH1285>
Mine eyes <WH5869> are ever <WH8548> toward <WH413> the LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> he <WH1931> shall pluck my feet out <WH3318> <WH7272> of the net. <WH4480> <WH7568>
Turn <WH6437> thee unto <WH413> me, and have mercy <WH2603> upon me; for <WH3588> I <WH589> am desolate <WH3173> and afflicted. <WH6041>
The troubles <WH6869> of my heart <WH3824> are enlarged: <WH7337> O bring thou me out <WH3318> of my distresses. <WH4480> <WH4691>
Look upon <WH7200> mine affliction <WH6040> and my pain; <WH5999> and forgive <WH5375> all <WH3605> my sins. <WH2403>
Consider <WH7200> mine enemies; <WH341> for <WH3588> they are many; <WH7231> and they hate <WH8130> me with cruel <WH2555> hatred. <WH8135>
O keep <WH8104> my soul, <WH5315> and deliver <WH5337> me: let me not <WH408> be ashamed; <WH954> for <WH3588> I put my trust <WH2620> in thee.
Let integrity <WH8537> and uprightness <WH3476> preserve <WH5341> me; for <WH3588> I wait on <WH6960> thee.
Redeem <WH6299> <WH853> Israel, <WH3478> O God, <WH430> out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> his troubles. <WH6869>
